title: Using 1Password 8 with the latest Firefox browser Version 106.0.1 (64 bits)
content: Before today, my 1Password 8 password manager worked just fine with Firefox browser on Windows 11. I updated my Firefox browser to 106.0.1 (64 bits) today and all of a sudden my 1Password manager stopped filling in my usernames and passwords for me into my logins. How do I get this functionality back so my 1Password manager works with Firefox again? Is there some setting that I failed to update in Firefox? Thanks. MR
creator: MJR3

title: Pocket   why do they only have Facebook and linkedlin to be used to share why not my personal email like they used to do?
content: I like to share articles with my family and friends but Pocket only uses facebook linkedin and such why not my personal email like they used to do
creator: guegrace

title: I cannot remove "google lead services".
content: goggleleadservices stops me from browsing! Tried every suggestion, nothing works and it is not listed under Programs (so I can't remove it from there)
creator: robcarolfamily

title: v106.0.1 (64-bit) Navegacion Privada
content: Hola queria comunidad de firefox, con la ultima actualizacion veo que se ha un poco independizado la navegacion privada de la navegacion comun y esta en parte bien quizas para muchos es practico anclar la navegacion privada y listo. En mi caso no me gusta, me gusta que tanto la navegacion privada como la navegacion normal esten bajo el mismo icono y no como una aplicacion separada. Como puedo volver al anterior estilo de Mozilla Firefox?? Gracias.
creator: lrmcbaarg
